content:
ChangeRequest:
  - RemoveFeature: Counter
  - AddFeature: 
      Name: Onboarding flow for Gyde
      Description: Multi-page onboarding flow with sliding transitions for a luxury chauffeur service app
      Pages:
        - WelcomePage:
            Text: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.'
            Button: 'Next'
        - AuthenticationOptionsPage:
            Text: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email'
            Button: 'Continue'
        - PhoneNumberInputPage:
            Text: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number'
            Button: 'Next'
        - VerificationCodePage:
            Text: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567'
            Button: 'Continue'
        - EmailCollectionPage:
            Text: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address'
            Button: 'Next'
        - WelcomeConfirmationPage:
            Text: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs'
            Button: 'Continue'
        - TermsAndConditionsPage:
            Text: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.'
            Button: 'Continue'
      Requirements: Use 'Gyde' branding throughout

overview: 
  - The application will undergo significant changes to remove the existing counter feature and introduce a new onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde.
  - This includes adding multiple pages with sliding transitions and updating the app's branding.
new_features: 
  - WelcomePage with 'Get Started' and introductory text
  - AuthenticationOptionsPage with options for phone and email
  - PhoneNumberInputPage for phone number verification
  - VerificationCodePage for entering the received code
  - EmailCollectionPage for collecting user email
  - WelcomeConfirmationPage to confirm successful onboarding
  - TermsAndConditionsPage with terms and conditions text
modified_features: 
  - Update app branding to reflect Gyde's luxury chauffeur service theme
removed_features: 
  - Counter feature from HomeView and HomeViewModel
architectural_changes: 
  - The app will maintain its Stacked architecture, but new routes will be added to app.router.dart for the onboarding flow.
  - Dependency injection setup in app.locator.dart may need updates to accommodate new services if required.
cross_cutting_concerns: 
  - Ensure consistent use of Gyde branding across all new and existing UI components
  - Implement sliding transitions for seamless navigation between onboarding pages
  - Update navigation logic to incorporate the new onboarding flow before reaching the main app functionality
